item.description:
Hi Everyone,

YOU MIGHT AS WELL RSVP --NOW-- SINCE WHEN ITS FULL - "ITS FULL"

YOU WILL HAVE TO BEG AND BRIBE TINA TO GET IN OTHERWISE.

NO ANNOUNCEMENTS  WILL BE SENT OUT  UNLESS THE WEATHER OR SOME OTHER SITUATION warrants it.

I will However mail out the driving directions shortly...

http://www.meetup.com/HCR-SK/events/43025662/

---------------------------------------------

Its that time again to  plan for this event and then "PADDLE" all the way to our:

"Celebrate New Years with Good People and Fellow Kayakers Event".

 


 

 

 

 

WEATHER: PLEASANT AND CALM with an occasional gust of wildness, 70*F inside, Water Temperature 104*F outside in the bubble pond.

It is Hot Pants and Shorts weather again !


As always we have a great environment of a wide selection of our own Pot Luck Foods offerings and Drinks, (Bring Something Good, this event only happens once a year), Our Own Music Selections, and of course --- other "FEATURES" of entertainment.

There is POOL, ----> yes both kinds, a pool table and a hot bubble pool, so bring the Hot Pants and a towel.

-------------------------------------------------

 

Location: SPECIFIC driving Details Released to Positive RSVP'eers closer to the event week and day if you do not already know them.

General Landmark: FROM HARTFORD: I-91 SOUTH towards Meriden CT, approach exit Near Rte I- 91 & Rte 15 Wilber Cross pky interchange = exit# 67 South. Take Exit and Go apx 1 mile to:(USE the Hairpin turn off exit for "Maint Garage"  off of rte.15 and go to end)

Take a RIGHT onto MILLER ------> and a few more nearby streets and specific GPS address # which i will add SOON)

 

al-r
item.how_to_find_us: When I arrive LOOK for the Orange Striped Cone on the roof of my car, head up to the house as listed in the directions.

group.who: River and Shore Kayak-r's of CT
group.name: ~~~~HARTFORD COUNTY RIVERS & CT SHORE KAYAK GROUP~~~~ HCR-SK

item.name: HCR-SK's Group NEW YEAR's EVENT @ MERIDEN CT
